sentence_zh_TW: 在這篇文章中，作者引用了一個例子來支持她的論點，讓讀者更容易理解。
sentence: In this article, the author uses an ______ to support her argument, making it easier for readers to understand.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這場比賽中，選手們必須跑得非常快，才能到達那個遠的終點線。
sentence: In this race, the competitors must run very fast to reach the ______ finish line.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這篇研究中，學者們嘗試定義各種文化的多樣性，以便更深入了解。
sentence: In this research, scholars attempt to ______ the diversity of various cultures for a deeper understanding.

sentence_zh_TW: 在課堂上，老師試圖解釋這個複雜的數學概念，以便學生能夠輕鬆理解。
sentence: In class, the teacher tries to ______ this complex math concept so that students can grasp it easily.

sentence_zh_TW: 午餐時間是我一天中最喜歡的，因為我可以享受好吃的食物和朋友的陪伴。
sentence: The ______ time is my favorite part of the day as I can enjoy delicious food and the company of friends.

sentence_zh_TW: 這張照片讓我回想起那些美好的回憶，讓我心中充滿了幸福。
sentence: This ______ brings back wonderful memories that fill my heart with happiness.

sentence_zh_TW: 十二月是全年中最後一個月，隨著假期的到來，大家都感到興奮。
sentence: ______ is the last month of the year, and as the holidays approach, everyone feels excited.

sentence_zh_TW: 在早晨，一杯熱咖啡往往能讓我充滿活力，開始新的一天。
sentence: A cup of hot ______ in the morning often energizes me to start the new day.

sentence_zh_TW: 在每次特殊的慶典中，巧克力都會成為每個人最喜歡的甜點選擇。
sentence: During every special celebration, ______ becomes everyone's favorite dessert choice.

sentence_zh_TW: 我們將在星期四舉辦一次重要的聚會，希望每個人都能參加。
sentence: We are hosting an important gathering on ______, and we hope everyone will attend.

sentence_zh_TW: 如果你需要錢，可以跟朋友借一些以應急。
sentence: If you need money, you can ______ some from a friend to help you out.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個車站服務著成千上萬的乘客，是交通的樞紐之一。
sentence: This ______ caters to thousands of passengers and is one of the key transportation hubs.

sentence_zh_TW: 他在考試中找到了正確的答案，這讓他感到非常欣慰。
sentence: He found the correct ______ during the exam, which made him feel very relieved.

sentence_zh_TW: 手指是人們用來觸摸物體和進行精細工作的不可或缺的部位。
sentence: The ______ is an essential part of the human body used for touching objects and performing fine tasks.

sentence_zh_TW: 能夠感覺他人的情感對於建立良好的人際關係至關重要。
sentence: Being able to ______ the emotions of others is crucial for building good interpersonal relationships.

sentence_zh_TW: 她對自己所取得的成果感到非常自豪，這讓她更加相信自己的能力。
sentence: She felt very ______ of the achievements she had made, which made her more confident in her abilities.

sentence_zh_TW: 這部電影在年輕人中非常受歡迎，因為它展現了當代青年的生活。
sentence: This movie is very ______ among young people as it reflects the lives of contemporary youth.

sentence_zh_TW: 在困難時期，朋友和家人的支持和幫助是十分重要的。
sentence: Support and ______ from friends and family are crucial during tough times.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個城市的某些區域享有較高的生活質量和便利設施。
sentence: Certain ______ of the city enjoy a higher quality of living and amenities.

sentence_zh_TW: 我通常在星期六去市場，因為那時有最新鮮的蔬菜和水果。
sentence: I usually go to the market on ______ because that’s when they have the freshest vegetables and fruits.
